name: Falling Spheres 3D
description:
'Falling Spheres' is the hottest 3d game on the AppStore!
Tap on the left or right side of the screen to move all spheres towards that direction, try not to get stuck on top of the platforms to not get crushed by the top spikes, and don't fall too quickly so you don't get crushed by the floor spikes.
Collect enough points to fall to the next level !
Fun and easy-to-play !
